name: Agro Global Token
description: What is the project about? What is Agro Token? Agro Global token is a project that combines its technological capabilities and expertise in agriculture with the digital world. Agro token will be traded in major cryptocurrency exchanges as well as in its own B2B trading platform. Token holders will be entitled to future rewards. What makes your project unique?
